description: Trade Agreement: CFTA / FTAs with Peru / Colombia / Panama / Korea Procurement Type: Competitive Procurement Competitive Bidding Type: Open Bidding Description: Furniture for Department of Fisheries and Oceans Group - Please do not submit offers older than 30 days Currency: CAD
full_summary:
## Tender for Furniture Procurement

### Notice Details

* **Title (English)**: Furniture
* **Title (French)**: Mobilier
* **Reference Number**: PW-CAL-146-7277
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: EP922-230123/B
* **Publication Date**: 2022-09-21
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-11T16:00:00
* **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
* **Tender Status (French)**: Expiré

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Participating in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* **Delivery Regions**: Nunavut Territory
* **End User Entities**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ **Name**: Abou Ahmad, Kassan
	+ **Email**: [Kassan.AbouAhmad@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:Kassan.AbouAhmad@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
	+ **Phone Number**: (403) 464-9492
	+ **Fax Number**: (418) 566-6167

### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites contractors to submit bids for the procurement of office furniture. The bid solicitation is subject to the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement, specifically the Nunavut Land Claims Agreement. Suppliers are strongly encouraged to submit bids electronically using the Canada Post Corporation's (CPC) Connect service. Faxed bids will be accepted at 1-418-566-6167.

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Please note that hard copy bids will not be accepted for this solicitation. Suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation will be provided with a debriefing or feedback session upon request.

Attachment: The bid document can be downloaded from [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/20
